name: Worm ⒽⒾⓉ
description:
An homage to the retro hit from the 80s, optimized for iPhone X and iPad Pro, with a twist on game mechanics. Compete with other players around the world in Game Center and hunt for the hi-score!

You start with a tiny worm. To grow, you need to eat the red dots. Each time you eat, your worm gets longer. But there is a catch: if you touch your tail, you die. 

NEW GAME MECHANICS
+ Swipe to control your worm
+ We introduce a level system. The amount of segments appended to your worm depends on the level you're in. Level 1 appends 1 segment, level 2 appends two segments and so on. This sounds simple but gets very hard very soon!

Enjoy a classic with a twist and time travel to the 80s!
